detail_desc: Dungarees in washed, stretch twill with adjustable straps and a pocket at the top. Side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs.

Dungarees in soft organic cotton with frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back and fasten with a press-stud at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully-fashioned trainers with mesh insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Loafers with rounded, slightly pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles.

Jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, hood with an elasticated drawstring and zip down the front. Side pockets, elasticated ribbing at the cuffs and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit in a slightly wider style with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Dress in patterned cotton chambray with a collar, buttons at the top and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a tie detail at the front and elastication at the back, discreet side pockets and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine knit with beaded embroidery, a small, ribbed stand-up collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, airy modal jersey with a low-cut back and short sleeves.
Set in soft cotton jersey with a dress and leggings. Patterned dress with long sleeves and gathered tiers to the hem. Unlined. Ribbed, ankle-length leggings with an elasticated waist.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in patterned, heavy cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, ribbed waistband and ribbed hems.

Long parka in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.

Body in lace and mesh with a bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that split and cross at the back and no fastening. Lined crotch with concealed press-studs.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pockets, pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with decorative gathers at the top of the front and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and pleats at the front. Fake fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem.
Knee-high boots with pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch, cotton-blend jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Semi-shiny tights with a push-up effect on the bum and a firm sculpting effect on the tummy, waist and thighs. 30 denier.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck and buttons down the front.

Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a decorative belt with a metal buckle.
Tube scarf and double-layered hat in soft jersey.

Calf-length dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell weave with a wrapover top and sewn-on band at the waist that ties at the back. Decorative gathers on the shoulder seams and at the back of the neckline. Short, wide sleeves, and two slits at the front. Unlined.
Pyjamas in supersoft jersey. Top with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.
Warm-lined boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles.
Treggings in stretch twill with a regular waist, visible zip in one side and a fake welt back pocket.
Mesh trainers with rubber details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Two-strand, thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length 38-46 cm.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a soft, ribbed viscose blend with a slightly deeper neckline at the front.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in an airy organic linen and cotton weave with short, frilled sleeves, buttons down the front and covered elastication at the hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons down the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette. For the matching trousers, search on 0391750.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. High collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and jersey trims at the cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket is made from partly recycled polyester.
Knee-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and short puff sleeves. Smocking at the back of the waist and wide ties at the front.
Off-the-shoulder top in a soft rib knit with a foldover edge at the top and short sleeves.

Blouse in airy plumeti chiffon with a small frill at the shoulders, and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Lace-trimmed collar, a seam at the top with decorative gathers, and long sleeves with a button and frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Pyjamas in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves with contrasting colour panels and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, side pockets and gently tapered legs with contrasting colour side stripes and ribbed hems.
Pre-tied bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Blouse in a stretch weave with a boat neck, wide 3/4-length sleeves with a scalloped trim, and a scalloped hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Wide top in soft pile with a drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Straight-cut T-shirt in a relaxed fit made from airy linen jersey.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Trainers in soft imitation leather with a hook and loop tab at the front and loop at the back. Soft terry linings and insoles and soft soles.

Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in twill with a zip down the front, wide shoulder straps and patch side pockets with a flap. Seam at the waist and a detachable fabric belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.
Lightweight sports jacket with a detachable mesh-lined hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and hem and reflective details. Mesh lining.
Moccasins in a fine-knit cotton blend and imitation leather with soft terry inside and soft suede soles.
Mesh trainers with an adjustable hook and loop tab over the foot, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate(EVA) and rubber soles.

Dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a seam with a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels and buttons at the front. Flap welt front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
High-waisted leggings in jersey with a semi-matt coating. The polyester content of the leggings is recycled.
Shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.
Jacket and trousers in soft fabric. Jacket with a zip down the front, chin guard and lined hood with ears on the top. Trousers in fleece with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood with reflective details and a stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Short, A-line dress in recycled polyester lace with a stand-up collar and an opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck. Long, wide puff sleeves, and wide, organza-lined cuffs with pearly plastic buttons. Seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Swimsuit with a decorative bow on the shoulder straps and a lined gusset.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip in the side and decorative metal chain. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Striped shorts in a cotton weave containing glittery threads with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Sleeveless dress in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif, seam at the waist and lined tulle skirt.
High-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with appliqués, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in velour with a gentle V-neck opening with support at the front and long sleeves.
Trainers with hook and loop fasteners at the top and a lightly padded edge around the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sandals with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation suede linings and insoles, and cork and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Loose-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and a racer back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, elasticated hem and opening at the back with crossover straps.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with an all-over print. Long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Soft bootees in velour with embroidery and appliqués. Foldover shaft and soft soles with anti-slip protectors. Jersey lining.
Jumper in a soft textured knit with a cable-knit section at the front, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with scalloped ribbing at the cuffs. Ribbing at the neckline and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with long sleeves and a hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring. Ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
